19 bool Csv::csv2map(const std::string &filename,
20  const int col1, const int col2) {
21  // Input stream to read the csv. Each line should hold one url.
22  std::ifstream url_csv(filename);
23  std::string::size_type sz; //needed to stoi -> string to int
24  //key -> id of record in csv, value url name
25 
26  if (url_csv.is_open()) {
27  std::string line;
28  boost::char_separator<char> sep{";"}; //used to tokenize csv row
29 
30  getline(url_csv, line); //in first line are identifiers, don't need them
31  int max_col = (col1 > col2) ? col1 : col2;
32  int counter_invalid_id = _max_invalid_ids; //number of ommited invalid ids
33  while (!url_csv.eof()) {
34  //tokenizing csv file line by line
35  getline(url_csv, line);
36  if (line == "") {
37  break;
38  }
39  t_tokenizer tok{line, sep};
40 
41  int col_num = 0, id = 0;
42  std::string domain;
43  if (counter_invalid_id < 0) {
44  std::cerr << "Too many invalid ids" << std::endl;
45  return false;
46  }
47 
48  try {
49  for (auto &t : tok) {
50  if (col_num == col1) { // Column of keys
51  id = std::stoi(t, &sz);
52  } else if (col_num == col2) { // Column of values
53  domain = t;
54  } else if (col_num > max_col) {
55  // No need to check later columns
56  break;
57  }
58  ++col_num;
59  }
60  } catch (std::invalid_argument &) { //if std::stoi throws exeption, we ignore this row with invalid id
61  // std::cerr << "invalid id, counter:" << counter_invalid_id<< std::endl;
62  --counter_invalid_id;
63  continue;
64  }
65 
66  if (col_num <= max_col) {
67  //data from column_numbers and csv file doesn't match, csv hasn't enough columns
68  std::cerr << "Number of columns from csv file is smaller than values wanted" << std::endl;
69  // std::cerr << "cols: " << col_num << "s: " << s << std::endl;
70  return false; //TODO jakos tu rzucac wyjatek
71  } else {
72  _id_url_map->insert(std::pair<int, std::string>(id, domain));
73  }
74  }
75  } else {
76  std::cerr << "Cannot open file: " << filename
77  << std::endl; //TODO jakis plik z logami czy cos, nie wypisywanie bledow na konsole, ewentualnie wyjatek
78  return false; //TODO jakos tu rzucac wyjatek
79  }
80  url_csv.close();
81  return true;
82 }
83 
84 const std::unique_ptr<Csv::map,
85  std::default_delete<Csv::map>> &Csv::getId_url_map() const {
86  return _id_url_map;
87  }
